customMethods.name: setKpi1_TotalEmployers
customMethods.script:
import extend.query
	
	query = """
SELECT 
	 COUNT([EmployerNew].[id]) counterEmployer
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[EmployerNew]
WHERE 1=1
	AND [EmployerNew].[id] IN (*?)
"""

	args = []

	################################################
	employerId = payload.get('employerId', -1)
	
	whereIn = '[EmployerNew].[id] IN (*?)'

	whereInFix, employerIdFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, employerId)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += employerIdFix
	
	#ystem.perspective.print(('kpi1:', args))
	#employerId =  [17, 38 ,39, 1]	
	# Expect employerId as  list 
	################################################
	
	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	result = result if result else 0
	
	kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Total Employers'
	kpi1.props.params.Value = '{:,}'.format(result)

customMethods.name: setKpi2_NumberOfApplicants
customMethods.script:
import extend.query
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	query = """
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT [participantId]) counterParticipants
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ApplicantStatus]
WHERE 1=1 
	AND [employerId] IN (*?)
"""

	args = []

	################################################	
	employerId = payload.get('employerId', -1)
	
	whereIn = '[employerId] IN (*?)'
	whereInFix, employerIdFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, employerId)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += employerIdFix 

	#employerId =  [17, 38 ,39, 1]	
	# Expect employerId as  list 
	################################################

	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	result = result if result else 0
	
	kpi2.props.params.Title = 'Number Of Applicants'
	kpi2.props.params.Value = '{:,}'.format(result)

customMethods.name: setKpi3_InterviewsMonthly
customMethods.script:
import extend.query
	
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	
	query = """	
DECLARE @dateFrom DATE = ?

SELECT COUNT([interviewedDate]) counterInterview
	,YEAR([interviewedDate]) AS [year]
	,MONTH([interviewedDate]) AS [month]
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ApplicantStatus]
WHERE 1=1
	AND [interviewedDate] IS NOT NULL
	AND [interviewedDate] >= DATEFROMPARTS(YEAR( @dateFrom),MONTH( @dateFrom),1)
	AND [employerId] IN (*?)
GROUP BY YEAR([interviewedDate]), MONTH([interviewedDate])
ORDER BY YEAR([interviewedDate]), MONTH([interviewedDate])
"""


	args = []
	
	################################################
	now = system.date.now()
	yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), 0, 1)
	monthStart = yearStart = system.date.getDate(system.date.getYear(now), system.date.getMonth(now), 1)
	sixMonthsBefore = system.date.addMonths(monthStart, -5)
	
	args += [sixMonthsBefore]
	################################################
	
	employerId = payload.get('employerId', -1)
	
	whereIn = '[employerId] IN (*?)'
	whereInFix, employerIdFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, employerId)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += employerIdFix 
	################################################
	
	#employerId =  [17, 38 ,39, 1]	
	# Expect employerId as  list 
	#ystem.perspective.print(('args kpi3:',args))
	
	result = system.db.runPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')

	# Provide series for all 6 months even if result from DB is empty
	_values = []
	for num in range(6):
		_time = system.date.addMonths(sixMonthsBefore, num)
		_month = system.date.getMonth(_time) + 1
		_year = system.date.getYear(_time)
		#ystem.perspective.print((_time, _month, _year))
		_lst = [row['counterInterview'] for row in result if row['year'] == _year and row['month'] == _month]
		_val = _lst[0] if len(_lst) > 0 else 0
		
		if len(_lst) > 1:
			raise ValueError('More than one element in the list!')

	 	_values.append(dict(applicants = _val, time = _time))

	kpi3.props.params.Value = _values
	
	kpi3.props.params.Title = 'Interviews Monthly'

#	Example:
#	_values = """	
#[
#  {
#		"applicants": 1,
#		"time": "9/1/2020"
#	  },
# 	 {
#		"applicants": 0,
#		"time": "10/1/2020"
#	  },
#	  {
#		"applicants": 1,
#		"time": "11/1/2020"
#	  },
#	]
	"""

customMethods.name: setKpi4_InterviewHire
customMethods.script:
import extend.query
	
	query = """
SELECT 
	ISNULL(
		SUM(CASE WHEN [hiredDate] IS NOT NULL AND [hiredState] = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0  
		/ NULLIF(SUM(CASE WHEN [interviewedDate] IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END), 0)
, 0) perc
FROM [RITIOps].[organization].[ApplicantStatus]
WHERE 1 = 1
AND [employerId] IN (*?)
"""

	args = []

	################################################
	employerId = payload.get('employerId', -1)
	
	whereIn = '[employerId] IN (*?)'
	whereInFix, employerIdFix = extend.query.getWhereInParamFix(whereIn, employerId)
	
	query = query.replace(whereIn, whereInFix)
	args += employerIdFix 

	#employerId =  [17, 38 ,39, 1]	
	# Expect employerId as  list 
	################################################
	
	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	
	kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")
	
	kpi4.props.params.Title = 'Interview/Hire %'
	kpi4.props.params.Value = '{} %'.format(int(result)) if result else '0 %'

customMethods.name: cleanKpis
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")
	kpi3 = self.getChild("KPI3")
	kpi4 = self.getChild("KPI4")	

	kpi1.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi1.props.params.Value = 0
		
	kpi2.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi2.props.params.Value = 0

	kpi3.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi3.props.params.Value = []

	kpi4.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi4.props.params.Value = 0

messageHandlers.script:
#raise ValueError('STOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOP!!! Under construction!')
	
	self.setKpi1_TotalEmployers(payload)
	self.setKpi2_NumberOfApplicants(payload)
	self.setKpi3_InterviewsMonthly(payload)
	self.setKpi4_InterviewHire(payload)
